meanings.definition: A loud, heavy sound made by something falling or hitting a surface.
meanings.sent1: The kathumps of the books falling off the shelf startled me.
meanings.sent2: I heard a kathumps when the hammer dropped on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The kathumps of the watermelon hitting the ground was so loud!
meanings.sent4: The kathumps of the heavy box hitting the floor echoed through the room.
meanings.sent5: The kathumps of the tree branch falling made me jump.

meanings.definition: To make a loud, heavy sound by falling or hitting a surface.
meanings.sent1: The vase kathumps onto the floor and shattered into pieces.
meanings.sent2: The rain kathumps against the window during the storm.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally kathumped the pot while cooking, and it made a mess.
meanings.sent4: His heart kathumped with excitement as he waited for the results.
meanings.sent5: The ball kathumps loudly as it bounces down the stairs.
